Title: Relates to prohibitions on single-use food service items
Summary: Provides that restaurants and third-party food delivery service may provide single-use food service items to customers when explicitly requested by the customer; prohibits certain plastic single-use items.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 34 §§27-3401 - 27-3405, En Con L; add §399-tt, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the general business law, in relation to prohibitions on single-use food service items at restaurants and third-party food delivery services
